timeline.message:
Add new institutions package under tools
- move OpsUser into its own file
add REDCap Complete column for Researcher
PopulateUserAffiliations: don't error if affiliation exists and is equal
Be more lenient with Researcher parsing

timeline.bodyText: Split the existing OpsUser into this and User
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: Originally PopulateOpsUserAffiliations - moved, renamed, and refactored
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: Tearing my hair out over this one.  If I return to this, it will be here: #3601
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: Super nitpick, but maybe these final static constants should be uppercased? I'm not sure if we have a clear style rule around this – Google's Java style says constants should be uppercase, and I do like the clarity that provides.
timeline.author: gjuggler
